trans-unit.source: Designing an Azure-Compliant Service Bus Contract
trans-unit.target: Designing an Azure-Compliant Service Bus Contract

trans-unit.source: A contract used by a <token>sb2</token> application that is running on <token>azure_1</token> is no different from the contract used by a <token>sb2</token> application that is running on a local computer.
trans-unit.target: A contract used by a <token>sb2</token> application that is running on <token>azure_1</token> is no different from the contract used by a <token>sb2</token> application that is running on a local computer.

trans-unit.source: Any differences are in the code, or in the configuration file specific to the application itself, not in how the interfaces are created.
trans-unit.target: Any differences are in the code, or in the configuration file specific to the application itself, not in how the interfaces are created.
